#### Description

Why use p and q when I can use more? Connect with `nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 4557`.
#### Consejos:
1.  There's more prime factors than p and q, finding d is going to be different.

#### Solución:
```
picoCTF{too_many_fact0rs_4025135}
```

* Copie la n sin espacios https://www.alpertron.com.ar/ECM.HTM:
![[Pasted image 20250521130748.png]]
![[Pasted image 20250521130927.png]]
#### Terminal linux:
```
yoli@Yoli:~/Fundamentos_Seguridad/Actividad_18-Retos_Crypto_3/4-b00tl3gRSA3$  nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 4557
c: 
n: 
e: 65537
```
